fields.question: What is APIT?
fields.answer: APIT (Advance Personal Income Tax) is a system where employers deduct income tax from employees' monthly salary. This helps spread the tax liability throughout the year instead of paying a lump sum.
fields.keywords: apit, advance tax, monthly tax, payroll tax

fields.question: What is personal relief?
fields.answer: Personal relief is an annual tax allowance of Rs. 1,800,000 available to all resident individuals for the tax year 2024/2025.
fields.keywords: personal relief, tax allowance, basic allowance

fields.question: When is the tax filing deadline?
fields.answer: The deadline for filing personal income tax returns is November 30th following the end of the tax year. The tax year runs from April 1st to March 31st.
fields.keywords: deadline, due date, filing date, tax return

fields.question: What is the tax-free threshold for personal income tax?
fields.answer: For the tax year 2024/2025, the tax-free threshold for personal income tax is Rs. 1,800,000 per annum.
fields.keywords: tax-free threshold, personal income tax, exemption limit

fields.question: How are rental incomes taxed?
fields.answer: Rental income is subject to income tax after a standard deduction of 25% to account for expenses.
fields.keywords: rental income, rent tax, property income

fields.question: Are EPF and ETF contributions tax-deductible?
fields.answer: Employee contributions to EPF (8%) are tax-deductible. Employer contributions to ETF (3%) are not deductible by the employee.
fields.keywords: EPF, ETF, retirement fund, tax deduction

fields.question: What deductions are available for charitable donations?
fields.answer: Donations made in money to approved charitable institutions are deductible up to Rs. 75,000 or 1/3 of taxable income, whichever is lower.
fields.keywords: charitable donations, tax deduction, approved charities

fields.question: Can I claim deductions for solar panel installations?
fields.answer: Yes, individuals can claim a deduction up to Rs. 600,000 for installing solar panels connected to the national grid.
fields.keywords: solar panels, renewable energy, tax deduction

fields.question: Are life and medical insurance premiums tax-deductible?
fields.answer: Premiums paid for life and medical insurance policies are tax-deductible up to specified limits.
fields.keywords: insurance premiums, life insurance, medical insurance, tax deduction

fields.question: How can senior citizens benefit from tax exemptions?
fields.answer: Senior citizens with total income not exceeding Rs. 1.8 million are exempt from interest income withholding tax.
fields.keywords: senior citizens, tax exemption, interest income
